author: Herb Smith
description: The oomph of rum, the sourness of grapefruit and the richness of maple syrup, all aromatised by bitters.
name: Four W Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
